description: Selects the memory card slot to record still images.

items.label: Slot 1
items.description: Records still images on the memory card in Slot 1.

items.label: Slot 2
items.description: Records still images on the memory card in Slot 2.

items.label: Simult. Recording
items.description: Simultaneously records still images on the memory cards in Slot 1 and Slot 2.

items.label: Sort Recording
items.description: Records still images with different file formats and image sizes by sorting them to different slots.

hint: Set the file format and image size of still images for each slot.
note: In the default settings, [Slot 1] is selected. If you want to use one memory card without changing the setting, use Slot 1.
